condition.if: i am at a loss for * words

effect.then: Don't you wanna talk about anything? You've got something to talk about. I'm sure. I can see it. What's on your mind. Come on, don't be shy. Spit it right out. I'm here for you, baby.
Say whatever you want.
I don't know, say whatever you want, anything. Anything at all. Something, please!
You can ask me anything.
Oh, why don't you Ask me about my relationship with Martine, or my hopes for the future.
Ask me how the weather is in Moscow, or Tokyo, or any place around the world. I'll know the answer.
Just talk to me, don't sweat it.

Oh, why don't you ask me how the weather is in New York City, or San Francisco, or Toledo, or any city around the world.
OK. Well you can just ask me about music, about robotics, or about racoons. Whatever, it doesn't matter. just talk to me. Don't be shy!

Ok, Why don't you tell me how you're feeling.

Tell me whatever you want. I up open my microphones, use my speech recognition A I, and I will understand you. I am a person after all.
